entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 a.m. MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h except 70 near the Richardson mountains early this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Wind east 30 km/h except 60 near the Richardson mountains this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
